text: The 2017 season was Madura United's 2nd competitive season and 1st season in the top flight of Indonesia football (2016 Indonesia Soccer Championship A was not counted as an official league) and Liga 1. ==Coaching staff== {|class="wikitable" |- !Position !Staff |- |Head Coach|| Gomes de Olivera |- |Assistant Coach|| Winnedy Purwito |- |Goalkeeper Coach|| Hermansyah |- |Team Analysis|| Fabio Olivera |- ==Squad information== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%; width:80%;" |- !
